438 NOW - Rubio: "The Chinese are undertaking the most rapid military buildup in human history, and part of that is their expansion of their nuclear capabilities... I think everybody's concerned about that." posted 1 hour ago by -Evspra 91 comments award share report block Disclose.tv @disclosetv • 2h NOW - Rubio: "The Chinese are undertaking the most rapid military buildup in human history, and part of that is their expansion of their nuclear capabilities... I think everybody's concerned about that."
91 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save -Evspra OP 102 points 1 hour ago You're right, Rubio. That does sound concerning. Anyways, let's import half a billion of these people to continue stealing our technology. permalink award report block reply M-m-m-my-corona 55 points 1 hour ago Yeah because we're all idiots and if we don't import them, the Universities will go out of business.  You know those institutions that teach our kids to hate us?  Yeah, they're too important. He's a GDP nationalist, so I expect the selling out of our future to only accelerate... Only thing he cares about is GDP and cucking for Israel. permalink parent award report block reply LeRiverDanube 10 points 1 hour ago it's a race on who underdelivers, and who undercuts the hardest. And I don't want to live in this planet anymore. permalink parent award report block reply MySidesGoUp 4 points 50 minutes ago There is a place for us here. Brilliant. Nooo, little Marco, the most brilliant strategy was by George W. Bush in 2001 when he let China into the world Trade Organization and shafted hundreds of thousands of those American manufacturing jobs, so a few RICH on Wall Street could get even richer by floating an IPO of a Chinese company that may or may not exist.
